Name: Core Passive: Fluctuating Voltage
Additional Ability: Parallel Connection
Descriptions: Launch a <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>, <color=#ffffff>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color> after the 3rd-hit of Anby's <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack</color> for an extra <color=#2BAD00>32%</color> Daze.

When another character in your squad shares the same Attribute or Faction:
When Anby's <color=#ffffff>Dodge Counter</color> hits an enemy, she gains an extra 7.2 Energy. This effect can trigger once every 5s.

Launch a <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color>, <color=#ffffff>Special Attack</color>, or <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color> after the 3rd-hit of Anby's <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack</color> for an extra <color=#2BAD00>37.3%</color> Daze.

Cons.Name: Rapid Charge Mode
Cons.Effect: When the 4th-hit of Anby's <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack</color> hits an enemy, her Energy Generation Rate is increased by 12% for 30s.

Cons.Name: Precision Discharge
Cons.Effect: When <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack: Thunderbolt</color> hits a Stunned enemy, its DMG is increased by 30%. When Anby's <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color> hits an enemy that is not Stunned, the Daze inflicted is increased by 10%.

Cons.Name: Conducting Charge
Cons.Effect:
When Anby launches a <color=#ffffff>Chain Attack</color> or uses her <color=#ffffff>Ultimate</color>, off-field Electric Agents recover 3 Energy.
For every 12% Energy Generation Rate Anby has, recover an additional 2 Energy, up to a maximum of 6.

Cons.Name: Charging Field
Cons.Effect: When Anby uses her <color=#ffffff>EX Special Attack</color>, she gains 8 stacks of Charge (max 8 stacks). When she hits an enemy with her <color=#ffffff>Basic Attack</color> or <color=#ffffff>Dash Attack</color>, 1 stack of Charge is consumed, increasing that attack's DMG by 45%.
